patterns: What can you do for me?

patterns: I did not receive my order!
responses: I'm sorry, but your order has been delayed...
Your order has been dispatched. You will receive it soon!

responses: Sure. Your appointment is scheduled at 16:00.

patterns: What do I do if I forget my password?
I forgot my password. What do I do?
responses: Please enter your associated Email ID. We will send you a link shortly thereafter.
Please enter your registered Email ID. We will send you a link shortly thereafter.
A link has been sent to you. Please reset your password using the same. Thank you for being patient!
We have sent you a link on your email! You can now reset your password using the same.

patterns: I would like to know the location of your nearest manufacturer.
responses: The nearest manufacturer is in Vietnam.
The nearest manufacturer is located in India.
I'm sorry, but we order all our stock directly from other retailers.

patterns: What information is shared with supplier?
What information do you share with your suppliers?
What information do your suppliers know about your company?
What data about your company is shared with other suppliers?
responses:
We share the following information with out suppliers as per policy: 
1. Production Schedule
2. Delivery Schedule
3. Proxy information about cost
We do not share any information other than our Production and Delivery Schedules with our suppliers.
Our suppliers only have access to our Production and Delivery Schedules.

responses: The HP Envy Foldable Laptop is one of our highest grossing products!

Which is the best selling product?

patterns: It is not clear what this product does

responses: Please enter the Product ID and your Customer ID. One of out team members will be contacting you soon regarding this issue!

patterns: I need the latest Version of this software.
I want to update the software on my device.

responses: The software is rolling out. You should receive it in a few days.

responses: Elections are sure to impact our sales this year...
Our analysis suggests that sales might increase during Festive Seasons...
Sales Analysists say that this year is going to be the brightest!

patterns: How have we improved our sales from last year?

responses: Sales have improved by 15% with an increase in the number of customers!
The quarterly profits are up by 10%!

Customers were dissatisfied and have given us a rating of 1 stars!

patterns: How much commission do you give on product sales?
responses:
Commission rates are:

  5% on Bluetooth Device

We provide a 7% commission on all of our products.
The normal commission rates are 7% on all of our products.
